方法详细信息

isFilenameValid

public static boolean isFilenameValid(java.lang.String file)
Only check if a given filename is valid according to the OS rules. You still need to handle other failures when actually creating the file (e.g. insufficient permissions, lack of drive space, security restrictions).

参数：
file - the name of a file
返回：
true if the file is valid, false otherwise
